title: Strictly's Michelle Visage says training helps her with breast implant struggles

Strictly Come Dancing fan favourite Michelle Visage got candid about her difficulties with breast implants on Lorraine this morning.

The star, who topped the Halloween Week leaderboard with her Addams family-inspired Foxtrot, chewed the fat with Lorraine Kelly about Catherine Tyldesley's controversial exit.

She also opened up about the struggles she's faced because of her now-removed breast implants.

Suffering with auto-immune issues for two decades, the RuPaul judge had them removed recently and has seen a marked improvement.

Getting rid of the implants wasn't the only thing that helped, as Strictly's rigorous training has given her a positive mindset.

The 51 year-old said: "When I took control of my health by removing my breast implants, I started to feel better and thought, 'What better way to have a second chance at life than Strictly?'

(Image: ITV)

"It took a good six weeks for me to get on my feet to the point were I thought, 'How am I going to be able to dance, I can't even go to the ladies' room by myself.'

"Each time I sweat, each time I'm pushing through an eight-hour rehearsal, I'm thinking, 'I'm healing, I'm healing, I'm healing,' and that's what pushes it through.

"This is a new woman, a new chance at life."

She also shunned the idea that her health difficulties would ever keep her from her work.

Michelle explained: "I am the sole breadwinner for a family of four - my husband's a stay-at-home dad, we don't eat, we don't pay the bills, we don't pay the rent if I don't work.

"So I have no choice but to pick my chin up and do what I have to do for my family."

(Image: BBC)

This week's show saw Michelle and partner, the hunky Giovanni Pernice, top the leaderboard, but pals Catherine and Johannes weren't so lucky.

The judges bench chose to save Mike Bushell from eviction and instead send Corrie's Catherine packing.

"My jaw was on the ground," admitted Michelle.

She continued: "Cath and Johannes are two of my closest friends in the competition...Cath is just on top of the world that she made it to Halloween week."

Michelle and Giovanni will be going into Week Seven on a high, closely trailed by Kelvin Fletcher and Oti Mabuse, Alex Scott and Kevin Clifton (covering for Neil Jones) and Saffron Barker and AJ Pritchard.
description: Michelle chatted to Lorraine about how having her implants removed gave her a renewed lease of life which lead her to Strictly
